SEARCH
Module com.example.uvs.GUI
Package com.example.uvs.GUI

Class VoteWindow

java.lang.Object
com.example.uvs.GUI.VoteWindow
public class VoteWindow extends Object
The VoteWindow class controls the voting window. It displays the voting options, allows users to vote, and allows user to send a feedback on a voting.
